title: Got hacked and had account password changed
body: My password got changed by someone earlier today, the request for the change password e-mail showed up yesterday and I ignored it, but somehow it still got changed. I changed my e-mail password and account password as a precaution, but I'm still not sure how they were able to change it. Is there any insight you could give on how to better protect myself and how this could have happened?

replies.body: If the password reset did come to your e-mail and still went through, the hacker already has access to that email as well. Good steps changing that email password, but I would go ahead and reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) just in case to make sure your account is still secure and there wasn't any damage done.
